attributes.action: FOR a State Funeral for Baroness Thatcher
attributes.additional_details:
In response to the "No state funeral for Maggie Thatcher" I would like to offer an alternative point of view. In the light of her many achievements, not least:
- changing the face of Britain for the better,
- removing the ability of the Unions to dictate national policy
- giving Britain the ability to compete on the international stage
- leading this country to an unparalleled economic boom which took 10 years of Labour to destroy.

I respectfully petition the government to grant a state funeral to Baroness Margaret Thatcher.
